reuters.title: CORRECTED - DATRON <DATR> AGREES TO BUYOUT
reuters.body: Datron Corp said it agreed to merge with GGHF Inc, a Florida-based company formed by the four top officers of the company. According to terms of the proposed transaction, each share of Datron common stock, excluding those shares owned by the four officers, will be converted into six dlrs a share, it said. Datron's officers hold about 73 pct of the total 896,000 Datron common shares outstanding, it said. (corrects company name, GGHF, in first paragraph) REUTER 
